title: Is Instagram's news feed time stamp accurate? - Quora

response.answer_text: Instagram’s news feed time stamp is accurate to an extent. It’s accuracy is dependent on what time frame you are looking at. The breakdown is as follows; Very accurate time stamps: 0 minutes - 1 hourMinute by minute time stampe.g. 12 (12 minutes ago) or 47 (47 minutes ago)Accurate time stamps: 1 hour - 24 hourHour by hour time stampe.g. 1 hour ago or 23 hours agoInaccurate time stamps 24 hours - 6 daysDay by day time stamp1 day ago or 6 days agoVery inaccurate time stamp 6 days or moreExact posting date time stamp15 July or 27 NovemberI hope to have answered your question fully! If you enjoyed this answer & gained information please make sure to UPVOTE it! If you are interested in learning more about all aspects of Instagram feel free to join our free Instagram Coaching Community here!

They are very accurate. Example:-If the post X was made on 1 am, then it will show 1 am,-If the post X was seen on 1:01 am, then it will show "one minute ago",-If the post X was seen on 5 am, then it will show "4 hours ago" (5:30, 5:45 will also show 4 hours not 5),-If the post X will be seen the next day then it will show "yesterday and hour",-If the posting time exceeded 24h, it will show the exact date and hour,
